channel.title: Cart stays in place while elevator rises [Fixed]
channel.description: In the On a Rail chapter on the first spinning elevator with the turrets your cart stays at the bottom while the elevator continues to rise, if you leave it when it starts elevating, leaving the cart "pierced" by the elevators shaft.

item.title: Cart stays in place while elevator rises [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: General_FLEISH
item.description:
In the On a Rail chapter on the first spinning elevator with the turrets your cart stays at the bottom while the elevator continues to rise, if you leave it when it starts elevating, leaving the cart “pierced” by the elevators shaft.

Read full topic
item.source: Cart stays in place while elevator rises [Fixed]
